author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: simple cli tool to PUT / GET / DELETE github files
name: github-crud

scripts.build-doc: node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shReadmeExportPackageJson && node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shDocApiCreate "{ exampleFileList:['test.js','index.js'], moduleDict:{'github-crud':{aliasList:['github_crud'],exports:require('./index.js')}} }"
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shReadmeExportPackageJson && npm_config_timeout_default=60000 node_modules/.bin/utility2 test test.js
